title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. III, pt. 20 - The Qualification Process
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. III, pt. 20 - The Qualification Process

State Regulations
§ 20.1 - Purpose
§ 20.2 - Purposes of the industrial effectiveness program
§ 20.3 - Definitions
§ 20.4 - Threshold criteria to qualify industrial firms for industrial effectiveness assistance
§ 20.5 - Threshold criteria to qualify groups of industrial firms for industrial effectiveness assistance
§ 20.6 - Threshold criteria to qualify industrial firms or purchasing groups for local buy-out assistance
§ 20.7 - Administration
§ 20.8 - Preference in outreach
§ 20.9 - Qualification procedures
§ 20.10 - Exemption from disclosure requirements
§ 20.11 - Reports

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 5, ch. III, pt. 20

Statutory authority: Economic Development Law, §§ 100[19], [20], [33], 190-196;N.Y.S. Urban Development Corporation Act, §§ 3[6][e], 10[e]; Omnibus Economic Development Act of 1987, § 7[a], [b][1]-[2], [e]
State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
